description:
After surviving a fall into a volcano, the Peace Force comes across an injured Sanada Ninja who offers to help battle his former allies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Heat Wave From Beneath the Earth
Chitei o Mau Akai Kagerou: Sakki! Sanada Sanninshuu
Dünyanın Altından Geen Bir Isı Dalgası
地底を舞う赤い陽炎・殺鬼! 真田三人衆
